title: Mellow Mushroom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of hippie themed pizzeria chain with choices for vegans and vegetarians, including tofu, tempeh, vegan cheese, and veggie toppings for pizza plus large salads. The spring water pizza is a vegan crust. Kitchen avoids cross contamination by keeping separate utensils for preparing veg/vegan.
